description: A GenericOccupiedSpace is a space that is not represented by any explicitly modelled AbstractOccupiedSpace subclass.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the GenericOccupiedSpace.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the GenericOccupiedSpace.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the GenericOccupiedSpace.

properties.name: lod0Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 0. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod1Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod2Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod0TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 0. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod0ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 0. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the GenericOccupiedSpace in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
